definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: Perhaps they spent time in the yard.
sentences.chinese: 也许他们在院子里打发时光。

sentences.english: I've been keeping my room as neat as a pin, and the yard is always ship-shape.
sentences.chinese: 我一直保持房间井然有序，院子也是修得井井有条的。

sentences.english: The laborers home from their fields spread their mats in the courtyards.
sentences.chinese: 劳动的人们从田间归来，把席子展铺在院子里。

sentences.english: Magpie and Cui son which is insolating clothes in the yard got a fright.
sentences.chinese: 正在院子里晒衣服的喜鹊和翠儿吓了一跳。

sentences.english: Don't throw the slops in the yard.
When I just arrived, buildings were two-floor ones with yards.
sentences.chinese: 我刚到的时候这里的建筑都是两层楼，带有院子的。

sentences.english: In Xinjiang, the courtyard of almost every home has a grape trellis.
sentences.chinese: 在新疆，几乎每家的院子里都有葡萄架。

sentences.english: Birds that overwinter in your garden need to find food 365 days of the year.
sentences.chinese: 在你的院子中过冬的鸟类一年365天都需要觅食。

sentences.english: And as Peter was beneath in the palace, there cometh one of the maids of the high priest
sentences.chinese: 彼得在下边，院子里，来了大祭司的一个使女。

sentences.english: Yue old 4 words sounds equitable fall, a went 3 people jumped inside in the yard from the over the wall.
sentences.chinese: 岳老四话音刚落，一行三人就从墙头跳到了院子里。

sentences.english: The loquat in the yard has got ripe gradually.
sentences.chinese: 院子里的枇杷渐次熟了。

sentences.english: The plants of courtyard appears to be more vigorous in hazy rain.
sentences.chinese: 院子的植物也因为下雨的关系，越发显得葱翠。

sentences.english: Linc asks to be let out into the yard.
sentences.chinese: Linc请求准许放他到院子里去。

sentences.english: The space is dotted with various types of houses and tradesman 's workshops with their messy yards.
sentences.chinese: 其间还点缀着各种住宅和商人的店铺和各式院子。

sentences.english: LuoXiaoChun to gu buildings to the hospital to send food taken late at night, two people came to the yard for a walk.
sentences.chinese: 骆晓春到医院给顾阡陌送夜宵，两人来到院子散步。

sentences.english: The staff trooped through the gaily decorated court.
sentences.chinese: 全体工作人同结队走过张灯结彩的院子。

definition: courtyard house with a fully enclosed courtyard (type of Chinese residence)
courtyard/atrium/opening in a roof/skylight/caisson ceiling/(TCM) acupuncture point TB10
central room of a traditional Chinese house
Pingfang district of Harbin 哈爾濱|哈尔滨[Ha1 er3 bin1] in Heilongjiang
